name: Archer Legend Fighting
description:
Archer Legend Fighting is an ancient war game, in which you have to play the role of real assassin shooter to cope with enemy ninja fighters. Become a former legendary ninja fighter to win this archery battle and survive in castle war by using your ancient fighting skill.
Features
• Real time game play animations
• Realistic Ancient world
• Awesome 3D environment
• Simple and smooth aiming control
• Easy UI and Control
• Tremendous sound effects
